content.question: <!--td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}--> Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in the data for the extent of censorship of the media in Russia between 1995 and 2018. Explain a possible reason for this trend. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about the relationship between democratization and censorship of the media in Russia. (c) Explain why government censorship of the media in Russia differs from government censorship of the media in Nigeria.

frqParts.text: <!--td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}--> Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in the data for the extent of censorship of the media in Russia between 1995 and 2018. Explain a possible reason for this trend. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about the relationship between democratization and censorship of the media in Russia. (c) Explain why government censorship of the media in Russia differs from government censorship of the media in Nigeria.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
